@Keith Boone @Divya Ahuja
14842 - Why patient is added in the list of actor for schedule? - 2018-Jan Core #182

Divya / Keith - can you clarify what you are asking for in this tracker? The schedule resource is meant to represent the availability of anyone who would be involved in an appointment. Patients of course can be involved in appointments, and a patient Schedule can let systems know when the patient is available (for example, they have appointment already booked for certain times, so those slots aren't available for new appointments).
I think the text that you have there is answering their question. Happy to block vote this one as answered
